main.name: Ruth C. Morata Gil
main.bio1: My name is Ruth C. Morata Gil and I am a Junior Full Stack Developer. I was born in Barcelona in 1985 and I dwelt both in Oxford (UK) and in Austria. I enjoy contributing, structuring, creating and suggesting improvements. I am currently searching for job opportunities to keep growing and learning. Looking forward to an exciting project to involve myself in!
main.bio2: Web development/design and Movement/body arts are the two fields my days revolve around and that I have my heart stolen by. I also try my best to be an NVC (Non-Violent Communication) practitioner.
main.contactmessage: Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you! Feel free to give me a shout by email or by using the form below.
main.contactwarningmessage: Warning: Contact form not yet configured, please contact me via normal email for now

education.degree: Master's degree in Full Stack Development
education.description1: Learned a great deal of technologies and carried out a group project (Skyscanner clone) using the Agile Methodology
education.description2: Frontend technologies: ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript

education.description1: Acquired the knowledge needed to work with 3D animation in order to apply it to the scientific field
education.description2: Created 3D molecules and animated the interactions between them

education.degree: Master’s Thesis in Bioinformatics for Health Sciences
education.description1: Second year of my Master's degree
education.description2: Developed entirely and also presented my Thesis while joining as a Visiting Researcher at the Structural Bioinformatics and Computational Biochemistry Unit (SBCB), placed in the Biochemistry Department of the University of Oxford (UK)
education.description3: Thesis title: Conformational Flexibility and Ligand Binding of the Outer Membrane Enzyme PagP
education.description4: Keywords: Membrane Proteins, Molecular Dynamics Simulations, GROMACS, Coarse Grain, Atomistic, Protein-Ligand Docking

education.degree: Master’s degree in Bioinformatics for Health Sciences
education.description1: First year of my Master's degree
education.description2: Immersed myself in the world of genomics, proteomics and molecular simulations, mainly using programming, data analysis and visualization
education.description3: Keywords: Molecular Dynamics Simulations, Computer-Assisted Drug Discovery, Perl/Python/R Programming, Computational Systems Biology, Genomic Bioinformatics, Project Management

education.description2: Successfully completed all theoretical and practical (lab) subjects
education.description3: Keywords: Quantum Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Data Analysis, FORTRAN, Organic and Inorganic Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry

work.company: BC Tours / Transcoma / DW (Bags&Go) / Intercruises / Exploramás / Spinergy / Tumlare / Tais / Citytravel / The Tour Guy / My Friendly Guide
work.title: Technical administrator / Check-in agent (Freelance)
work.description1: Acted as an intermediate between exhibitors and providers, working as a technical administrator for Fira de Barcelona in congresses like SAP, MWC, BIZ, ITMA, Smart City, IBTM, Fòrum Gastronòmic. Technology used: SAP
work.description2: Assisted passengers as a cruise check-in agent at Port de Barcelona. Hosted services like transfers, hospitalities and tours for AMA Waterways and Viking Cruises
work.description3: Took part in the organisation and execution of team building events for corporations as well as of incentives such as the Chairman’s Council EMEA

work.title: English teacher (Freelance)
work.description1: Worked as a private English teacher for kids, teenagers and adults. Customised sessions.
work.description2: Prepared students for official examinations regardless of the level (from KET to Proficiency)

work.title: Logistics agent
work.description1: Administrated and processed shipping orders of sintered mechanical pieces for both national and international clients at the Logistic Department
work.description2: Examinated imperfections in mechanical pieces using the electron microscope while doing an internship as an apprentice at the I+D Department

resume.skillmessage: During my studies and my free time I have acquired the following skills:

projects.title: Ara en Moviment
projects.category: Association from Catalonia that integrates dance and education
projects.description1: Concept creation, complete redesign and development of the entire webpage.

quote.text: Today's mighty oak is just yesterday's nut that held its ground.
